string-array.item: The king \n of a forgotten kingdom sent their\n wizards to build a huge labyrinth§#14#200
with the goal of create a \n challenge for their children§#14#200
thus choosing a king from among they.#14#200
The labyrinth was designed \n to judge the physical and of the candidate to the king.#14#200
The prize: the kingdom.\nFor the losers to death.#14#200
Many of his children perished in the labyrinth and \n as punishment the gods held the whole \n kingdom capital within a bottle#14#200
and put it inside the labyrinth. \n Now the characters must#14#200
find an object that is inside the city#14#200
